articles.author: Jazmin Tolliver
articles.title: Two Holland America Crew Members Die During 'Incident' On Cruise Ship - HuffPost
articles.description: The cruise line said in a statement that it was "deeply saddened" by the incident.
articles.content:
Two crew members on a Holland America Line cruise ship died during an undisclosed incident in the ships engineering space, according to the cruise line. 
The unidentified crew members died while the… [+3715 chars]
